entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023
